title: Tanks and the trade-off(or lack thereof) between building tank and bruiser
body:
tanks deal way too much damage in this game, there is literally no trade-off between picking a tanky character and picking a semi squishy bruiser who you would expect to do more damage(not the case)

There needs to be negatives for picking the current overtuned tanky characters. You wanna build tank, you should do minimal dps. Period.

replies.body: Have been saying this for a long time. Conqueror helped but then it was nerfed early game and we're almost right back to where we started. Sadly, at the moment, if you want to do damage, pick a mage. If you want to be tanky, pick a tank.
